### *Email*

They are here to address any questions or clarifications you may have. If you would like to communicate with the Biostatistics Core, please feel free to reach out to Justin Kinney or Taehoon Ha via email.

+ Justin Kinney (Faculty Head): [jkinney@cshl.edu](mailto:jkinney@cshl.edu)
+ Taehoon Ha (Core Director): [ha@cshl.edu](mailto:ha@cshl.edu)

They will be happy to assist with any course-related inquiries or provide further guidance. Please include a clear subject line and a detailed message to ensure a prompt and efficient response. Take advantage of this opportunity to reach out with your questions or concerns. They are dedicated to supporting your learning experience throughout the course.
